metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2673 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An authorization-check flaw was discovered in federation configurations of the OpenStack Identity service (keystone). An authenticated federated user could request permissions to a project and unintentionally be granted all related roles including administrative roles.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2673` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

keystone - 2:9.3.0-0ubuntu3.1
python-keystone - 2:9.3.0-0ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: keystone package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:9.3.0-0ubuntu3.1').
